item.title: A Glee-ful Screamfest
item.author: Astrid Armgarth,
item.description: Lately, the horror genre has experienced a surge of interest with TV-series such as The Walking Dead and my personal favourite American Horror Story. The latter is truly a breath of fresh air in your weekly TV-schedule and the end of its second season is approaching fast! This show has received high …

item.title: The Science in the Series
item.author: Astrid Armgarth,
item.description: Recently, I read an interesting article about outraged nerds demanding a change of the outdated definition of the term nerd. As it stands, the official translation according to the Oxford English Dictionary is “a foolish or contemptible person who lacks social skills or is boringly studious”. At a …
